message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value and uniqueness of the item. However, I would like to propose a lower price of $850000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $875000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $860000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll offer the product to you for $870000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering our previous discussions.

Thank you for your continued effort in negotiating, Alice. I've reviewed the product again and based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $865000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your continued interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll offer the product to you for $880000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered the product's value and your previous offers. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $875000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll offer the product to you for $885000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering our previous discussions.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed the product again and based on my assessment, I would like to propose a final price of $880000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually agreeable solution.
